description: This file contains solver logic for calculus operations such as derivatives, integrals, and limits. It uses mathjs for evaluation and provides LaTeX rendering and step explanations. It exports a main function 'solveCalculusProblem' that handles different calculus problem types.

methods.name: toLatexSafe
methods.description: Converts a mathjs expression to LaTeX, with fallback to original input on failure.

methods.name: ordinal
methods.description: Converts a number to its ordinal string form (e.g., 1 -> first).

methods.name: parseLimitInput
methods.description: Parses a string representing a limit problem, extracting the expression, variable, and point of approach.

methods.name: solveCalculusProblem
methods.description: Main exported function that solves differentiation, integration, or limit problems given input parameters.
